text: Welcome! Use your scroll wheel to zoom in and drag the mouse to move around.
Open the property menu (second tab).
In the property menu, you can buy factories, shops, and land in other countries to expand your business.
Click on the plus button in the top-left corner to take a loan.
Buy a shop and a factory and return to the map.
Select the factory
Click on the add connections button to connect it to a shop.
Factories automatically deliver cookies to shops they are connected to.
You can have up to three connections.
You can upgrade the factory to increase its speed and storage. You can also buy more trucks to deliver biscuits faster.
Now select the shop.
You can upgrade the shop to increase its storage and attract more customers.
You can also customize the price of the biscuits. If they sell to fast, increase the price. If their storage is full, decrease it.
Now open the stock market menu (third tab).
You can choose to invest in three different companies. Buy stocks when the price is low and sell them when the price is high to make a profit.
Don't forget to frequently check the share price of companies you've invested in.
Lastly, open the news menu (fourth tab).
Some news articles have no relevance, but others can contain useful information.
Some news can help you decide what countries to expand your business into, or what countries you should increase biscuit prices in.
Others can hint at when the stock value of one of the three companies is about to go up.
Your goal is to reach $10000000. Good luck!
